content.question: A function f has Maclaurin series given by <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>4</mn> </msup> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> <mo>!</mo> </mrow> </mfrac> <mo>+</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>5</mn> </msup> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>3</mn> <mo>!</mo> </mrow> </mfrac> <mo>+</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>6</mn> </msup> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>4</mn> <mo>!</mo> </mrow> </mfrac> <mo>+</mo> <mo>⋯</mo> <mo>+</mo> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mrow> <mi>n</mi> <mo>+</mo> <mn>3</mn> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> <mrow> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mi>n</mi> <mo>+</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>!</mo> </mrow> </mfrac> <mo>+</mo> <mo>⋯</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@55B7@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. Which of the following is an expression for <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>?</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D6E@</annotation> </semantics> </math>

topic.text: 10.14: (BC ONLY) Finding Taylor or Maclaurin Series for a Function

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
